TITLE Pear Chutney

# In a small saucepan suate [1/3 cup [minced] shallots], [2 tsp [minced] fresh ginger] in [olive oil] until softened.
# Add [2 cup [chopped] anjou pear], [1 tbl brown sugar], [3/4 tsp salt]. Saute 4 minutes. 
# Stir in [1/4 cup [chopped] dried apricots] and [2 tbl white balsamic vinegar].
# Simmer 10 minutes.
# Stir in [1 tsp [chopped] rosemary].
